import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Delete from '../../../images/icons/trash.svg' import Edit from '../../../images/icons/edit.svg' import axios from 'axios' class AddStudentModal extends Component { constructor() { super() this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.state = { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", contactInformation: [{ address: "", unit: "", city: "", state: "", zipcode: "", }], type: "".toUpperCase(), success: "" } } setEmail(value) { this.setState({ email: value }) } setPassword(value) { this.setState({ password: value }) } setFirstName(value) { this.setState({ firstName: value }) } setLastName(value) { this.setState({ lastName: value }) } setAddress(value) { this.setState({ contactInformation: { address: value } }) } setUnit(value) { this.setState({ contactInformation: { unit: value } }) } setCity(value) { this.setState({ contactInformation: { city: value } }) } setUserState(value) { this.setState({ contactInformation: { state: value } }) } setZipcode(value) { this.setState({ contactInformation: { zipcode: value } }) } setType(value) { this.setState({ type: value }) } handleSubmit() { const user = { firstName: this.state.firstName, lastName: this.state.lastName, //dob: this.state., //picture: "", email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password, type: this.state.type ? this.state.type : document.getElementById("type").value, contactInformation: [{ address: this.state.contactInformation.address, city: this.state.contactInformation.city, state: "MO", zipcode: this.state.contactInformation.zipcode }] } save } render() { const iconStyle = { width: 18, height: 18 } return (

this.setFirstName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="firstName" className="form-control w-100" id="firstName" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="First Name" />
this.setLastName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="lastName" className="form-control w-100" id="lastName" placeholder="Last Name" />
this.setAddress(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAddress" name="address" placeholder="1234 Main St" />
this.setUnit(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAddress2" name="unit" placeholder="Apartment, studio, or floor" />
this.setCity(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" name="city" id="inputCity" />
this.setZipcode(e.target.value)} type="text" name="zipcode" className="form-control" id="inputZip" />

{this.state.message}

); } } export default AddStudentModal;
